DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine wether ketorolac is effective in the treatment of postoperative pain after total knee arthroplasty
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Naropin and Ketorolac for Postoperative Analgesia After Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Total knee arthroplasty Age > 18 Tolerance for study drugs Written informed consent
